00044 
00045 TFile* OpenFile(const char* filename, const char* option)
00046 {
00047   //see if it's already open
00048   TSeqCollection* files = gROOT->GetListOfFiles();
00049   for(int i=0; i< files->GetSize(); i++){
00050     if( TString(files->At(i)->GetName()) == TString(filename))
00051       return (TFile*)(files->At(i));
00052   }
00053   
00054   //otherwise try to open it
00055   TFile* f = new TFile(filename,option);
00056   if(!f || !f->IsOpen() || f->IsZombie()){
00057     cerr<<"Unable to open file "<<filename<<endl;
00058     return 0;
00059   }
00060   return f;
00061 }
00062 
00063 TTree* GetEventsTree(const char* filename)
00064 {
00065   TFile* f = OpenFile(filename);
00066   if(!f)
00067     return 0;
00068   TTree* Events = (TTree*)(f->Get("Events"));
00069   if(!Events){
00070     cerr<<"Unable to open Events tree from file "<<filename<<endl;
00071     return 0;
00072   }
00073   return Events;
00074 }
00075   
00076 TGraph* GetAverageGraph(const char* filename, int channel)
00077 {
00078   TFile* f = OpenFile(filename);
00079   if(!f)
00080     return 0;
00081   TString name = "average_channel";
00082   name += channel;
00083   TGraph* g = (TGraph*)(f->Get(name));
00084   if(!g){
00085     cerr<<"Unable to open graph "<<name<<" from file "<<filename<<endl;
00086     return 0;
00087   }
00088   return g;
00089 }

00091 TGraphErrors* GetAverageGraph(int run_no, int channel) {
00092   std::string run;
00093   std::stringstream out;
00094   out << run_no;
00095   run = out.str();
00096   std::string filename(6-run.size(), '0');
00097   filename = "/data/s1waveform/Run" + filename + run + ".root";
00098   //std::cerr << filename << std::endl;
00099   return (TGraphErrors*) GetAverageGraph(filename.c_str(), channel);
00100 }
00101 
00102 int DividePad(TPad* p, int nplots)
00103 {
00104   int npadsx = 1, npadsy=1;
00105   if( nplots < 2)
00106     {}
00107   else if( nplots == 2)
00108     npadsx=2;
00109   else if (nplots < 5){
00110     npadsx=2; npadsy=2;
00111   }
00112   else if(nplots < 7){
00113     npadsx=3; npadsy=2;
00114   }
00115   else if(nplots < 10){
00116     npadsx=3; npadsy=3;
00117   }
00118   else if(nplots < 13){
00119     npadsx=4, npadsy=3;
00120   }
00121   else if(nplots < 17){
00122     npadsx=4; npadsy=4;
00123   }
00124   else{
00125     npadsx=(int)TMath::Ceil(sqrt(nplots)); 
00126     npadsy=(int)TMath::Ceil(sqrt(nplots));
00127   }
00128   p->Divide(npadsx,npadsy);
00129   return npadsx*npadsy;
00130 }
00131 
00132 int explode_string(const std::string& s, char delim, 
00133                    std::vector<std::string>& out)
00134 {
00135   //find all the occurrences of delim
00136   size_t start = 0;
00137   while(1){
00138     size_t end = s.find(delim,start);
00139     if(end == std::string::npos)
00140       break;
00141     out.push_back(s.substr(start, end-start));
00142     start = end+1;
00143   }
00144   out.push_back(s.substr(start,std::string::npos));
00145   return out.size();
00146 }
00147 
00148 std::vector<std::string> explode_cut(const TCut& cut)
00149 {
00150   std::vector<std::string> out;
00151   //when you && or add cuts together, each cut is placed into parentheses
00152   //but have to avoid things like (x-y)/2
00153   std::string s = cut.GetTitle();
00154   size_t pos = 0;
00155   int prev = 0;
00156   while(pos < s.size() && pos != std::string::npos){
00157     //look for the combination )&&, which marks an edge
00158     pos = s.find(")&&",pos);
00159     if(pos == std::string::npos) pos = s.size()-1;
00160     //now look backward until you find the matching '('
00161     int open = 0;
00162     int pos2 = pos;
00163     while(--pos2 > prev){
00164       if(s[pos2] == ')') ++open;
00165       else if(s[pos2] == '('){
00166         if(open == 0) break;
00167         else --open;
00168       }
00169     }
00170     out.push_back(s.substr(pos2+1,pos-pos2-1-open));
00171     ++pos;
00172     prev = pos+2;
00173   }
00174   return out;
00175 }
00176 
00177 void SetAliases(TTree* Events)
00178 {
00179   //first read in one event and figure out what the run number is
00180   EventData* ev = 0;
00181   Events->SetBranchAddress("EventData",&ev);
00182   Events->GetEntry(0);
00183   RunDB::runinfo run_info;  //<does nothing!!! 
00184   //loop over all the defined channels and alias their spectra
00185   for(size_t i=0; i < run_info.channels.size(); i++){
00186     RunDB::runinfo::channelinfo& chinfo = run_info.channels[i];
00187     if(chinfo.channel < 0) continue;
00188     //user 2 filters for top pmts, 3 filters for bottom
00189     int filters = 2;
00190     if(chinfo.channel == 7) filters=3;
00191     double spe = GetSPEScaleFactor(run_info.runid, chinfo.channel,filters);
00192     TString aliasname="npe";
00193     aliasname += chinfo.channel;
00194     std::stringstream aliasdef;
00195     aliasdef<<"(-channels["<<chinfo.channel<<"].regions[1].integral/"
00196             <<spe<<")";
00197     Events->SetAlias(aliasname, aliasdef.str().c_str());
00198   }
00199   //add some global definitions
00200   Events->SetAlias("topspec","npe0+npe1+npe2+npe3+npe4+npe5+npe6");
00201   Events->SetAlias("botspec","npe7");
00202   Events->SetAlias("sumspec","topspec+botspec");
00203   Events->SetAlias("min","channels[].regions[1].min");
00204   Events->SetAlias("max","channels[].regions[1].max");
00205   Events->SetAlias("pmt","channels[].channel_id");
00206 }

00208 void DrawOperationsBoxes(bool drawbubble, bool drawrecirc)
00209 {
00210   double dummy, y1, y2;
00211   gPad->Update();
00212   gPad->GetRangeAxis(dummy,y1,dummy,y2);
00213   
00214   if(drawbubble){
00215     double x1[] = { TTimeStamp(2010,04,15,11,06,55,0,0).GetSec(),
00216                     TTimeStamp(2010,05,03,15,51,33,0,0).GetSec(),
00217                     TTimeStamp(2010,05,05,10,54,19,0,0).GetSec(),
00218                     TTimeStamp(2010,05,05,15,57,33,0,0).GetSec()
00219     };
00220     double x2[] = { TTimeStamp(2010,04,15,16,38,48,0,0).GetSec(),
00221                     TTimeStamp(2010,05,03,20,40,28,0,0).GetSec(),
00222                     TTimeStamp(2010,05,05,13,29,44,0,0).GetSec(),
00223                     TTimeStamp(2010,05,05,18,45,53,0,0).GetSec()
00224     };
00225     
00226     for(size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(x1)/sizeof(double); i++){
00227       TBox b(x1[i], y1, x2[i], y2);
00228       b.SetFillStyle(3002);
00229       b.SetFillColor(kRed);
00230       b.DrawClone();
00231     }
00232   }
00233   if(drawrecirc){
00234     double x1[] = { TTimeStamp(2010,05,07,15,40,32,0,0).GetSec(),
00235                     TTimeStamp(2010,07,14,17,23,00,0,0).GetSec()
00236     };
00237     double x2[] = { TTimeStamp(2010,05,07,23,59,59,0,0).GetSec(),
00238                     TTimeStamp(2010,07,15,16,27,21,0,0).GetSec()
00239     };
00240     for(size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(x1)/sizeof(double); i++){
00241       TBox b(x1[i], y1, x2[i], y2);
00242       b.SetFillStyle(3002);
00243       b.SetFillColor(kBlue);
00244       b.DrawClone();
00245     }
00246   }
00247 }
00248 
00249 double GetBaseline(TGraph* g, int npts, bool subtract)
00250 {
00251   double* gy = g->GetY();
00252   double baseline = accumulate(gy,gy+npts,0.)/(1.*npts);
00253   if(subtract){
00254     for(int i=0; i < g->GetN(); i++) gy[i] -= baseline;
00255   }
00256   return baseline;
00257 }
00258 
00259 TGraph* GetRealEvent(const char* filename, int eventnum, int channel)
00260 {
00261   Reader reader(filename);
00262   if(!reader.IsOk()){
00263     std::cerr<<"Unable to open file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00264     return 0;
00265   }
00266   
00267   EventHandler* handler = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00268   handler->AddModule<ConvertData>();
00269   handler->Initialize();
00270   RawEventPtr event = reader.GetEventWithID(eventnum);
00271   if(event == RawEventPtr()){
00272     std::cerr<<"Unable to load event with id "<<eventnum<<std::endl;
00273     return 0;
00274   }
00275   handler->Process(event);
00276   EventPtr evt = handler->GetCurrentEvent();
00277   handler->Finalize();
00278   
00279   ChannelData* chdata = evt->GetEventData()->GetChannelByID(channel);
00280   if(!chdata){
00281     std::cerr<<"Unable to load data for channel "<<channel<<std::endl;
00282     return 0;
00283   }
00284   return chdata->GetTGraph();
00285 }
00286 
00287 ChannelData* GetChannelData(const char* filename, int eventnum, int channel)
00288 {
00289   Reader reader(filename);
00290   if(!reader.IsOk()){
00291     std::cerr<<"Unable to open file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00292     return 0;
00293   }
00294 
00295   EventHandler* handler = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00296   handler->AddModule<ConvertData>();
00297   handler->Initialize();
00298 
00299   ChannelData* chdata = 0;
00300   
00301   while(reader.IsOk() && !reader.eof()){
00302     RawEventPtr event = reader.GetEventWithID(eventnum++);
00303     if(event == RawEventPtr()){
00304       std::cerr<<"Unable to load event with id "<<eventnum<<std::endl;
00305       return 0;
00306     }
00307     if(eventnum%5000 == 0)
00308       Message(INFO)<<"Processing event "<<eventnum<<std::endl;
00309     
00310     handler->Process(event);
00311   }
00312   EventPtr evt = handler->GetCurrentEvent();
00313   handler->Finalize();
00314   
00315   chdata = evt->GetEventData()->GetChannelByID(channel);
00316   if(!chdata){
00317     std::cerr<<"Unable to load data for channel "<<channel<<std::endl;
00318     return 0;
00319   }
00320   
00321   return chdata;
00322 }
00323 
00324 double CorrelationCoefficient(int npts, double* x, double* y)
00325 {
00326   double sumx=0, sumy=0, sumx2=0, sumy2=0, sumxy=0;
00327   for(int i=0; i< npts; i++){
00328     sumx += x[i];
00329     sumy += y[i];
00330     sumx2 += x[i]*x[i];
00331     sumy2 += y[i]*y[i];
00332     sumxy += x[i]*y[i];
00333   }
00334   //formula from wikipedia Correlation and Dependence
00335   return (npts * sumxy - sumx*sumy) / 
00336     ( sqrt(npts*sumx2 - sumx*sumx) * sqrt(npts*sumy2 - sumy*sumy) );
00337 }
00338 
00339 TCut GetStandardCuts()
00340 {
00341   TCut energy_min = "event.s1_full>50";
00342   TCut energy_max = "event.s1_full < 10000";
00343   TCut saturated = "!event.saturated";
00344   //TCut peak_time = "GetPulse(0)->peak_time-GetPulse(0)->start_time < 0.1";
00345   TCut s1length = "GetPulse(0)->end_time-GetPulse(0)->start_time<20";
00346   TCut baseline = "GetChannelByID(-2)->baseline.found_baseline";
00347   TCut p0start = "GetPulse(0)->start_time < 0.1 && GetPulse(0)->start_time > -0.1";  
00348   TCut status = "event.status==0";
00349   return energy_min + energy_max + saturated + s1length + baseline + p0start+status;
00350 }
00351 
00352 TCut GetTwoPulseCuts()
00353 {
00354   TCut drift="event.drift_time>20";
00355   TCut s2 = "event.s2_full>10";
00356   TCut t95="GetPulse(1).t95>10 && GetPulse(1).t95<30";
00357   TCut valid = "event.s1s2_fixed_valid";
00358   return GetStandardCuts()+drift+s2+t95+valid;
00359 }
00360 
00361 TCut GetOnePulseCuts(bool onlyone)
00362 {
00363   TCut base = GetStandardCuts()+"event.s1_fixed_valid";
00364   if(onlyone)
00365     base += "GetChannelByID(-2)->npulses == 1";
00366   return base;
00367 }
00368 
00369 TCanvas* TwoPulsePlots(TTree* Events, bool queryfit, TCut cuts,TCanvas* c)
00370 {
00371   TCut all_cuts=cuts+GetTwoPulseCuts();
00372   c->Clear();
00373   c->Divide(3,2);
00374   //set the canvas title
00375   EventData* evt=0;
00376   Events->SetBranchAddress("event",&evt);
00377   Events->GetEntry(0);
00378   if(evt){
00379     int first_run = evt->run_id;
00380     stringstream cantitle;
00381     cantitle<<"Run "<<first_run;
00382     Events->GetEntry(Events->GetEntries()-1);
00383     if(evt->run_id != first_run)
00384       cantitle<<" - Run "<<evt->run_id;
00385     c->SetTitle(cantitle.str().c_str());
00386   }
00387   bool plotlog = true;
00388   //uncorrected s2/s1 vs drift time
00389   c->cd(1);
00390   if(plotlog){
00391     Events->Draw("log(event.s2_full/event.s1_full) : drift_time",
00392                  all_cuts+"event.f90_full < 0.5","colz");
00393   }
00394   else{
00395     Events->Draw("(event.s2_full/event.s1_full) : drift_time",
00396                  all_cuts+"event.f90_full < 0.5","colz");
00397   }
00398   TH1* htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("htemp");
00399   double tau = 1000000.;
00400   if(htemp){
00401     htemp->SetName("hraw");
00402     htemp->SetTitle("Ln(S2/S1) vs Drift Time");
00403     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Drift time [#mus]");
00404     htemp->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Ln(S2/S1)");
00405     
00406     TGraph* pf = (TGraph*)gROOT->FindObject("Graph");
00407     pf->SetName("gscatter");
00408     //TProfile* pf = ((TH2*)(htemp))->ProfileX("s2s1vtime");
00409     //pf->Draw("same");
00410     if(pf){
00411       const char* fitfunc = (plotlog ? "pol1" : "expo");
00412       double fitmin=50, fitmax = 120;
00413       if(queryfit){
00414         gPad->Update();
00415         std::cout<<"Enter '<min> <max>' range to fit lifetime:"<<std::endl;
00416         std::cin>>fitmin>>fitmax;
00417       }
00418       pf->Fit(fitfunc,"q","same",fitmin, fitmax);
00419       TF1* pol1 = pf->GetFunction(fitfunc);
00420       if(pol1){
00421         pol1->SetLineColor(kRed);
00422         pol1->Draw("same");
00423         tau = -1./pol1->GetParameter(1);
00424         TPaveText* pt = new TPaveText(0.1,0.1,0.9,0.3,"NDC");
00425         pt->SetBorderSize(0);
00426         stringstream text;
00427         text<<"Lifetime = "<<(int)tau<<"#pm"
00428             <<(int)(tau*tau*pol1->GetParError(1))
00429             <<" #mus";
00430         pt->AddText(text.str().c_str());
00431         text.str("");
00432         text<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::fixed)<<setprecision(2);
00433         text<<"Intercept = "<<pol1->GetParameter(0)<<"#pm"
00434             <<pol1->GetParError(0);
00435         pt->AddText(text.str().c_str());
00436         pt->Draw();
00437       }
00438     }
00439   }
00440   stringstream alias;
00441   alias<<"exp(event.drift_time/"<<tau<<")*event.s2_full / event.s1_full";
00442   Events->SetAlias("ratio_corrected",alias.str().c_str());
00443 
00444   c->cd(2);
00445   Events->Draw("log(ratio_corrected) : drift_time",
00446                all_cuts,"colz");
00447   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("htemp");
00448   if(htemp){
00449     htemp->SetName("hcorrected");
00450     htemp->SetTitle("Ln(S2/S1) Corrected vs Drift Time");
00451     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Drift time [#mus]");
00452     htemp->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Ln(S2/S1) Corrected");
00453     //gPad->SetLogz();
00454   }
00455   c->cd(3);
00456   Events->Draw("log10(ratio_corrected):event.f90_full>>hscatter(100,0,1,100,-3,3)",
00457                all_cuts,"colz");
00458   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("hscatter");
00459   if(htemp){
00460     htemp->SetName("hscatter1");
00461     htemp->SetTitle("Log(S2/S1) vs F90");
00462     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("F90");
00463     htemp->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Log10(S2/S1) corrected for drift");
00464     gPad->SetLogz();
00465   }
00466   c->cd(4);
00467   Events->Draw("event.drift_time ",
00468                all_cuts);
00469   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("htemp");
00470   if(htemp){
00471     htemp->SetName("hdt");
00472     htemp->Rebin(2);
00473     htemp->SetTitle("Drift Time");
00474     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("drift time [#mus]");
00475   }
00476   c->cd(5);
00477   Events->Draw("log10(ratio_corrected)>>hratiolow(100,-3,3)",
00478                "event.f90_full>0 && event.f90_full<0.55"+all_cuts);
00479   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("hratiolow");
00480   if(htemp){
00481     htemp->SetName("hratiolow1");
00482     htemp->SetTitle("Log10(S2/S1) corrected");
00483     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Log10(S2/S1) corrected");
00484   }
00485   Events->Draw("log10(ratio_corrected)>>hratiohigh(100,-3,3)",
00486                "event.f90_full>0.55 && event.f90_full<1"+all_cuts,"sames");
00487   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("hratiohigh");
00488   if(htemp){
00489     htemp->SetName("hratiohigh1");
00490     htemp->SetLineColor(kRed);
00491     htemp->SetTitle("F90>0.55");
00492     gPad->SetLogy();
00493   }
00494   
00495     
00496   c->cd(6);
00497   Events->Draw("event.y : event.x " , 
00498                "event.position_valid" + all_cuts);
00499   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("htemp");
00500   if(htemp){
00501     htemp->SetName("hxy");
00502     htemp->SetTitle("Event Position");
00503     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("X [cm]");
00504     htemp->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Y [cm]");
00505   }
00506   
00507   
00508   
00509   c->cd(0);
00510   c->Modified();
00511   c->Update();
00512   return c;
00513   
00514 }
00515 
00516 TCanvas* OnePulsePlots(TTree* Events, TCut cuts,TCanvas* c)
00517 {
00518   TCut all_cuts = cuts+GetOnePulseCuts();
00519   EventData* evt=0;
00520   Events->SetBranchAddress("event",&evt);
00521   Events->GetEntry(0);
00522   if(evt){
00523     int first_run = evt->run_id;
00524     stringstream cantitle;
00525     cantitle<<"Run "<<first_run;
00526     Events->GetEntry(Events->GetEntries()-1);
00527     if(evt->run_id != first_run)
00528       cantitle<<" - Run "<<evt->run_id;
00529     c->SetTitle(cantitle.str().c_str());
00530   }
00531   
00532   c->Divide(2,2);
00533   c->cd(1);
00534   Events->Draw("event.s1_full>>hspec(200,0,4000)", all_cuts);
00535   TH1* htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("hspec");
00536   if(htemp){
00537     htemp->SetTitle("Energy Spectrum");
00538     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Energy [npe]");
00539   }
00540   c->cd(3);
00541   Events->Draw("event.f90_full:event.s1_full>>hfe(50,0,4000,50,0,1)",
00542                all_cuts, "colz");
00543   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("hfe");
00544   if(htemp){
00545     htemp->SetTitle("f90 vs Energy");
00546     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Energy [npe]");
00547     htemp->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("f90");
00548   }
00549   c->cd(4);
00550   Events->Draw("event.f90_full>>hf90(100,0,1)",all_cuts);
00551   htemp = (TH1*)gROOT->FindObject("hf90");
00552   if(htemp){
00553     htemp->SetTitle("f90");
00554     htemp->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("f90");
00555   }
00556   return c;
00557 }
00558 
00559 TCanvas* PlotSpeDistributions(TTree* Events, bool normalize)
00560 {
00561   if(!Events) return 0;
00562   //get the runid from the first event
00563   EventData* evt = 0;
00564   Events->SetBranchAddress(EventData::GetBranchName(), &evt);
00565   Events->GetEntry(0);
00566   //try to load the calibration
00567   //RunDB::runinfo info(evt->run_id);
00568   //info.LoadCalibrationInfo();
00569 
00570   //plot all the channel histograms
00571   int nchans = (int)Events->GetMaximum("nchans");
00572   TCanvas* can = new TCanvas;
00573   DividePad(can,nchans);
00574   for(int i=0; i<nchans; i++){
00575     can->cd(i+1);
00576     std::stringstream cmd;
00577     cmd<<"channels["<<i<<"].single_pe.integral";
00578     if(normalize)
00579       cmd<<"/channels["<<i<<"].spe_mean>>h"<<i<<"(100,0,3)";
00580     else
00581       cmd<<">>h"<<i<<"(100,0,"<<3*evt->channels[i].spe_mean<<")";
00582     Long64_t entries = Events->Draw(cmd.str().c_str(),"");
00583     //Draw a TLine at the single photoelectron
00584     gPad->Update();
00585     double x = (normalize ? 1 : evt->channels[i].spe_mean);
00586     double y = gPad->GetY2();
00587     TLine* line = new TLine(x, 0, x, y);
00588     line->SetLineColor(kBlue);
00589     line->Draw();
00590 
00591     //set logy
00592     if(entries)
00593       gPad->SetLogy();
00594     
00595                             
00596   }
00597   can->cd(0);
00598   return can;
00599 }
00600 
00601 
00602 double ElectronLifetime(TTree* Events, bool newcanvas, bool defaultlimits)
00603 {
00604   if(newcanvas) new TCanvas;
00605   Events->Draw("event.s2_full/event.s1_full : event.drift_time >>hprof",
00606                GetTwoPulseCuts()+"event.f90_full<0.5","prof");
00607   TProfile* hprof = (TProfile*)gROOT->FindObject("hprof");
00608   double min = 50, max = 120;
00609   gPad->Update();
00610 
00611   if(!defaultlimits){
00612     std::cout<<"Enter fit limits:"<<std::endl;
00613     std::cin>>min>>max;
00614   }
00615   hprof->Fit("expo","MIQ","",min,max);
00616   TF1* expo = hprof->GetFunction("expo");
00617   double tau = -1./expo->GetParameter(1);
00618   //std::cout<<"Lifetime = "<<tau<<"+/-"<<tau*tau*expo->GetParError(1)<<" ; "
00619   //   <<"Intercept = "<<expo->GetParameter(0)<<"+/-"<<expo->GetParError(0)
00620   //   <<std::endl;
00621   return tau;
00622 
00623   
00624 }
00625 
00626 void SaveHistoToFile(TObject* c)
00627 {
00628   if(!c->InheritsFrom("TH1"))
00629     return;
00630   TH1* h = (TH1*)c;
00631   static const char* filetypes[] = {
00632     "Text files","*.txt",
00633     0,0
00634   };
00635   TGFileInfo fi;
00636   fi.fFileTypes = filetypes;
00637   new TGFileDialog(gClient->GetRoot(),0,kFDSave,&fi);
00638   if(!fi.fFilename)
00639     return;
00640   std::string fname = fi.fFilename;
00641   if(fname.rfind(".txt")==std::string::npos)
00642     fname.append(".txt");
00643   std::cout<<"Saving histogram "<<h->GetName()<<" to file "<<fname<<std::endl;
00644   std::ofstream fout(fname.c_str());
00645   if(fout.is_open()){
00646     fout<<"#X\tY\tYerr\n";
00647     for(int i=1; i<=h->GetNbinsX(); ++i){
00648       fout<<h->GetBinLowEdge(i)<<"\t"
00649           <<h->GetBinContent(i)<<"\t"
00650           <<h->GetBinError(i)
00651           <<endl;
00652     }
00653   }
00654 }
00655 
00656 void CustomizeHistogramMenus()
00657 {
00658   //have to do each child class separately
00659   //TH1F
00660   TClass* cl = TH1F::Class();
00661   TList* l = cl->GetMenuList();
00662   l->AddFirst(new TClassMenuItem(TClassMenuItem::kPopupUserFunction,cl,
00663                                  "Save as ASCII","SaveHistoToFile",0,
00664                                  "TObject*",0));
00665   //TH1D
00666   cl = TH1D::Class();
00667   l = cl->GetMenuList();
00668   l->AddFirst(new TClassMenuItem(TClassMenuItem::kPopupUserFunction,cl,
00669                                  "Save as ASCII","SaveHistoToFile",0,
00670                                  "TObject*",0));
00671   
00672 
00673 }
